proposal: Hey Magic Yearn community, congrats on reaching 71 holders on the BSC network! You've built a magical world with custom NFTs and staking opportunities, and we admire your MY tokens' unique blend of farming and rebase. Imagine enhancing your ecosystem with a DEX or a blockchain-based lottery. Or perhaps, a DAO for further governance and proposals? All these are tools from our workshop, ready to align with your vision. See my profile for demo and details.
